product_summary: Refact.ai is a cloud-hosted AI coding assistant that helps developers write better code faster. It offers a range of features, including code completion, refactoring, bug fixing, and code analysis. Refact.ai is available as a plugin for JetBrains and VS Code, and it can also be used as a self-hosted solution.
product_cons: Can be expensive for some users
May not be compatible with all IDEs
May not be suitable for all coding tasks
Can be slow to load large codebases

product_usecases.case: Start writing code and Refact will autocomplete lines for you
product_usecases.details: Refact.ai can be used to automatically complete lines of code as you type, which can save you time and help you write more efficient code.

product_usecases.case: Use pre-built prompts to refactor, analyse, fix bugs in the code
product_usecases.details: Refact.ai comes with a library of pre-built prompts that you can use to refactor code, analyze code, and fix bugs. This can save you time and help you improve the quality of your code.

product_usecases.case: Ask any code question in the chat
product_usecases.details: Refact.ai includes a chatbot that you can use to ask any code question. The chatbot will provide you with answers and suggestions, which can help you learn new things and solve problems.

product_toolfor.details: Refact.ai is designed for developers of all levels, from beginners to experienced professionals.
Refact.ai can be used by students to learn new programming concepts and improve their coding skills.
Refact.ai offers a team version that allows multiple users to collaborate on code projects.

product_pricing: Refact.ai offers a free plan and a paid plan. The paid plan costs $19 per month and includes additional features, such as unlimited code completions, advanced code analysis, and priority support.
